pages.text: $(li)Shoebills are passive birds. When attacked, Shoebills will take to the skies and flee.$(br)$(li)Shoebills sometimes stand in the water, and fish for fish.$(br)$(li)Shoebills can be feed up to 10 Terrapin Eggs to increase their lunk or 10 Crocodile Eggs to increase their lure to improve their fishing.
They like to hunt baby Turtles, baby Terrapins and baby Crocodiles, as well as most fish.
